DOC.brief_summary: The LMA Proseal LMA Supreme third generation LMA potential advantage classic LMA.Several publication report successful , safe use Laryngeal Mask Airway device patient undergo laparoscopic surgery . However , study examine application LMA patient lateral position laparoscopic surgery . The aim study observe safety efficacy LMA Proseal LMA Supreme use lateral position laparoscopic surgery general anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison LMA Proseal LMA Supreme Efficient Ventilation During Lateral Positioned Laparoscopic Surgeres
DOC.detailed_description: We undertake single-blind , parallel-group , randomize control trial.The patient randomize either LMA Proseal group LMA Supreme group computer generate allocation . The patient schedule elective lateral position laparoscopic surgery , laparoscopic radical nephrectomy , laparoscopic renal cyst decortication ( LRCD ) laparoscopic adrenalectomy.Inclusion criterion patient : Aged > 18 year , ASA physical status grade I - Ⅲ body mass index ≤30 kg.m-2 . Exclusion criterion : anticipate difficult airway ( e.g. , Modified Mallampati Class IV , oropharyngeal pathology ) , severe cardiopulmonary disease , increase risk regurgitation aspiration ( e.g. , gastro-esophageal reflux disease , pregnant patient ) , retroperitoneal laparoscopic procedure .
DOC.criteria: The patient belong ASA physical status grade I Ⅲ , age 18 year body weight less 30 kg/m2 , underwent elective laparoscopic urology surgery lateral position . The patient anticipate difficult airway ( e.g. , Modified Mallampati Class IV , oropharyngeal pathology ) , severe cardiopulmonary disease , increase risk regurgitation aspiration ( e.g. , gastroesophageal reflux disease , pregnant patient ) , retroperitoneal laparoscopic procedure .
